header.rec_loc: The Tram coffee shop in Tarnow, Poland
header.topics: Checking the football results, homesickness/SAD, a student, good coffee, message from a friend, feeling responsible for students (and preparing them for exams), working on farms, dogs, media, reading, birds, umbrellas, shopping, drinking, boots.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) in The Tram coffee shop in Tarnow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language
